attributes.action: Provide funding for Grove Training to stay open and support our learners
attributes.additional_details: Grove Training has an excellent track record for working with hard to reach learners and we deliver good quality training for the unemployed. quote from JCP advisor “Grove Training provides some of the best provision in the area especially for our clientele. Although there are other providers for the mainstream we feel there will be a massive void in suitable provision for the harder to place clientele.”
attributes.background:
Grove Training is closing because our funding has been cut by  our prime contractor who has overspent. 
We deliver pre-employment training to the unemployed.
Learners are at the heart of everything we do and we take pride in supporting some of the most vulnerable people.

rejection.details:
You could contact the Department for Work and Pensions directly to ask about the opportunities to bid for specific Government contracts or other grants:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions
